title: Panic in createIssueComment()
body:
### Description

adding label creates panic.
code being run (cloudforet-io/check-pr-action@v1):
```
await octokit.rest.issues.addLabels({
        ...context.repo,
        issue_number: context.issue.number,
        labels: ['fail/signedoff']
})
```
